k ri. wa. 1500-k ri. wa. 2000: mul nawa yugaye sita warthamanaya dakwa: yatathwijithakaranaya nisa indu yuropa bhasha mulu lokaye ma pathirima, wisheshayen ma romanuka bhasha (uthuru, madh yama ha dakunu amarikawa, uthuru ha upa - saharanu ap rikawa, ha batahira aasiyawa), batahira jarmanuka bhasha (uthuru amerikawe, upa - saharanu ap rikawe, nagenahira aasiyawe, oost reliyawe ing risi bhashawa; saha itha adu washayen jarmanu ha landesi) saha rusiyanu (madh yama ha uthuru aasiyawe) pathirima.

ebawinma me jeththukara padadayata erehiwa marana warenthuwa kihipa warakma liyawina.ohu sipiri geyaka lagga wannata balawathun bata kaha.me jeththukara padadaya kisi witekath wasare hondama naluwa wuye natha.eheth ohu siyawasak mululle adata da jiwath wa sitinneya.ohu sinamawe shuddha yugaya lesa handinwana nihanda sinama yugaye melowa eliya dutuweya.dijital sinama thakshaye di da ohu dakina siyallama sathutin ipila yathi.jiwithaya pilibanda yali hitha balannata sudanam wethi.me jeththukara padadaya nirmanaya karanuye loka sinama ithihasaya bihi kala agraganya sinamawediyeku wana chali chaplin wisini.chaplin yanu sinama naluwaku ho adhyakshawarayeku pamanak nowe.
